content.en: Microfluidics algorithms: Researchers are using algorithms to answer a variety of questions in the field of microfluidics. These algorithms are being used to analyze the behavior of microfluidic filters, control electroosmotic flow in complex microgeometries, model various microfluidics applications, compute stationary free-surface shapes, study the effects of Joule heating, optimize microfluidic components, simulate two-phase flows, calculate hydrodynamic interactions, and much more. By employing algorithms, scientists are able to gain insights and make advancements in the field of microfluidics.
content.da: Mikrofluidik-algoritmer: Forskere bruger algoritmer til at besvare en række spørgsmål inden for mikrofluidik. Disse algoritmer bruges til at analysere mikrofluidiske filters adfærd, styre elektroosmotisk flow i komplekse mikrogeometrier, modellere forskellige mikrofluidik-applikationer, beregne stationære frie overfladeformer, studere virkningerne af Joule-opvarmning, optimere mikrofluidiske komponenter, simulere tofase-flow, beregne hydrodynamiske interaktioner og meget mere. Ved at anvende algoritmer er forskere i stand til at opnå indsigt og gøre fremskridt inden for mikrofluidik.
